most_active_tickets.title: Pieces desktop this message is empty please try again
Kaspersky Internet Security flags Pieces OS as a virus

common_issues.title: Pieces Desktop App and Extension Errors
common_issues.description: Users report various errors like 'This message is empty' or malfunctioning features. These issues appear on different platforms (Windows, macOS) and affect both the desktop app and extensions. Proposed solutions include restarting the app, waiting for patches, or providing detailed bug reports to the Pieces team for investigation and resolution.

related_issues.title: "Secret Message" Example doesn't work properly
related_issues.text:
"Secret Message" Example doesn't work properly
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application

### Operating System / Platform

macOS

### Your Pieces OS Version

11.2.1

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

When using LTM-2 to test the secret message example:
https://pieces.app/magic-moments/ltm

I got a strange response from the LLM:
Claude 3.5:
First Try:
![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/1962a3e4-8b02-4d3f-bc8c-4bdd72c80aa6)
2. try: (waited longer on the website)
![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/cd71c5c1-d5d5-4449-acd5-e070fb244fa9)

Gemini 2.0 Flash did fail completely:
![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/50735f7a-28a1-4563-b490-e10c271eca23)
## Summary of GitHub Issue Discussion: 

**Key points:**

* Several users reported experiencing "Basic mode" due to device constraints. 
* The issue seems to be related to vector support not working on their machines even though they have the hardware capabilities.
* This leads to problems like Workstream Activity not being accessible and LTM updates not being displayed.

**Problems identified:**

* Users are unable to access Workstream activity and LTM updates.
* Vector search is not supported even on devices that have the hardware capability.
* There is a UI bug displaying "basic mode" on devices that support vector search.
* The issue seems intermittent, making it hard to reproduce.
* The unknown installation with version 1.0.10 needs clarification. 

**Solutions proposed/implemented:**

* Restarting PiecesOS temporarily resolves the "basic mode" issue for some users.
* A fix is being prepared and will be included in the next PiecesOS version.
* Mark offered to elaborate on what "basic mode" means.

**Current status/outcome:**

* Temporary solution: Users can try restarting PiecesOS.
* Long-term solution: A fix is expected in the next PiecesOS version.
* Mark offered to clarify the "basic mode" concept and the unknown version 1.0.10 installation.

related_issues.title: Pieces desktop this message is empty please try again
related_issues.text:
Pieces desktop this message is empty please try again
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application

### Operating System / Platform

Windows

### Your Pieces OS Version

Pieces for Developers 4.0.2

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

When copy paste code sencond time in Ask anything give error  this message is empty please try again
## Summary of GitHub Issue Conversation

**Key Points Raised:**

* Users are encountering an error message "Pieces desktop this message is empty please try again show error" when trying to send messages.
* This issue appears to be affecting the desktop app on Windows, Mac, and potentially other platforms.
* The error occurs after sending the first message in a new chat.

**Problems Identified:**

* Users are unable to send messages in Pieces desktop app.
* This disrupts the core functionality of the application, affecting communication and collaboration.

**Solutions Proposed/Implemented:**

* The Pieces team identified the issue and released a patch to resolve it.
* The patch is expected to be available shortly.

**Current Status/Outcome:**

* The fix is currently being rolled out.
* Users can expect the issue to be resolved once the update is available.

**Additional Notes:**

* The issue appears to be widespread, affecting multiple platforms and users.
* The Pieces team responded promptly and provided helpful resources while working on a solution.
* Users are encouraged to update their Pieces desktop app to the latest version once available.

related_issues.title: Chrome Extension messing out stackoverflow
related_issues.text:
Chrome Extension messing out stackoverflow
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application, Web Extension

### Operating System / Platform

macOS

### Your Pieces OS Version

11.2.2

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

It fills this text endlessly...

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/6b5edb10-b7cf-4fa6-a523-aa73af94cbee)
## GitHub Issue Conversation Summary

**Issue:** Embed buttons not working on specific page

**Key Points:**

* User reported issue with embed buttons not working on a specific page.
* Pieces support bot responded and routed the issue to the appropriate team member.
* Rutvik from Pieces requested additional information from the user to diagnose the problem.

**Problems Identified:**

* Embed buttons not working on a specific page.
* This might be due to embed buttons being enabled on the page, which is a known issue.

**Solutions Proposed/Implemented:**

* Rutvik requested the user to share their PWE version and confirm if embed buttons were enabled on the page.
* This information will help Rutvik determine if the issue is related to the known problem with embed buttons on certain pages.

**Current Status/Outcome:**

* The user has not yet responded with the requested information. 
* The issue remains open and pending further investigation.

## Additional Notes:

* The issue was created on March 9, 2025.
* The latest update was on March 11, 2025.

common_issues.title: Pieces OS Update and Launch Issues
common_issues.description: Users are experiencing issues with Pieces OS updates failing and the application not launching properly on Windows.  This appears to be related to antivirus software falsely flagging the application and potential conflicts with the App Installer.  Suggested solutions include configuring antivirus exceptions and ensuring the App Installer is up to date.

related_issues.title: Kaspersky Internet Security flags Pieces OS as a virus
related_issues.text:
Kaspersky Internet Security flags Pieces OS as a virus
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application, Pieces OS

### Operating System / Platform

Windows

### Your Pieces OS Version

PiecesOS_11.2.2.0_x64

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/160ed12d-f0a1-46be-bf36-05502353405e)
## Summary of GitHub Issue Conversation

**Key Points Raised:**

* The user is experiencing problems with their Pieces OS. 
* The problem occurs during the update process.

**Problems Identified:**

* The OS update fails.

**Solutions Proposed/Implemented:**

* The support bot recommends other issues with similar problems and suggests checking the documentation, YouTube channel, and existing issues.

**Current Status/Outcome:**

* The issue has been triaged and routed to the appropriate team member. 
* The user will receive a follow-up within 24 hours.

**Additional Notes:**

* There is no information about the specific details of the update failure.
* It is unclear whether the user has tried any troubleshooting steps or provided relevant information.

related_issues.title: Pieces OS Update fails
related_issues.text:
Pieces OS Update fails
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application

### Operating System / Platform

Windows

### Your Pieces OS Version

11.2.1

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

The notification popped up saying an update was available so I clicked Update and a few seconds later got this message box:

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/b14dc8ab-632a-4095-b45b-7bbaba3c70ce)

This is on a very fresh Windows 11 installation.
## Summary of GitHub issue conversation:

**Key points raised:**

* ThatRendle reported an issue with PiecesOS not launching on Windows.
* Nathan-courtney-pieces suggested updating App Installer and checking if the error persists.
* Bejokun encountered a "trojan detected" error and provided a screenshot.
* Nathan-courtney-pieces advised configuring Kaspersky to allow Pieces OS processes.

**Problems identified:**

* PiecesOS not launching on Windows, possibly due to App Installer issues.
* False positive "trojan detected" error from Kaspersky antivirus software.

**Solutions proposed/implemented:**

* Update App Installer.
* Configure Kaspersky to allow Pieces OS processes.

**Current status/outcome:**

* Unclear if ThatRendle's issue is resolved.
* Bejokun's issue should be resolved by configuring Kaspersky antivirus.

**Additional notes:**

* The conversation suggests that App Installer issues and antivirus software might be causing PiecesOS launch problems on Windows.
* It's important to ensure that antivirus software is not blocking PiecesOS processes.

common_issues.title: Pieces OS Update and Installation Issues
common_issues.description: Users are experiencing issues with Pieces OS updates and installations, including update failures, false positive virus detections by Kaspersky, and problems with personal domain backup and restore functionality. Suggested solutions include updating the App Installer, configuring Kaspersky to allow Pieces OS processes, and checking for conflicting personal domain names.

related_issues.title: Personal Domain backup
related_issues.text:
Personal Domain backup
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application

### Operating System / Platform

Windows

### Your Pieces OS Version

11.2.2

### Early Access Program

- [x] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

I want to sync this PC to another PC，but i cann't backup the lastest data.
![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/bfb4fb14-5e7f-45c7-828f-5f77f550453a)

this is another PC

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/3c2d880e-a1b2-40c1-82b1-9935bffbf8fb)
## Key Points Raised:

* **Labor123 is experiencing two issues:**
    1. Unable to change personal domain after copying com.pieces.os and com.pieces.pfd to another PC.
    2. Unable to back up their current computer using Personal Domain and restore it to a new computer.

## Problems Identified:

* **Personal domain registration conflict:** The domain laborer123 is trying to register is already taken.
* **Backup/restore functionality:** Laborer123 is unable to use the backup/restore functionality with their current personal domain.

## Solutions Proposed/Implemented:

* **Mark-at-pieces suggests:**
    * Trying to register a new personal domain to confirm functionality.
    * Clicking the refresh button to initiate a restore using the existing backup.

## Current Status/Outcome:

* Laborer123 confirms they want to back up their current computer and restore it to a new computer using Personal Domain, but are unable to create a new backup.
* It's unclear if laborer123 has attempted to register a new personal domain or use the refresh button for restore.

## Additional Notes:

* Laborer123's question about directly backing up and creating a new personal domain with their existing domain remains unanswered.

related_issues.title: Pieces OS Update fails
related_issues.text:
Pieces OS Update fails
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application

### Operating System / Platform

Windows

### Your Pieces OS Version

11.2.1

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

The notification popped up saying an update was available so I clicked Update and a few seconds later got this message box:

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/b14dc8ab-632a-4095-b45b-7bbaba3c70ce)

This is on a very fresh Windows 11 installation.
## Summary of GitHub issue conversation:

**Key points raised:**

* ThatRendle reported an issue with PiecesOS not launching on Windows.
* Nathan-courtney-pieces suggested updating App Installer and checking if the error persists.
* Bejokun encountered a "trojan detected" error and provided a screenshot.
* Nathan-courtney-pieces advised configuring Kaspersky to allow Pieces OS processes.

**Problems identified:**

* PiecesOS not launching on Windows, possibly due to App Installer issues.
* False positive "trojan detected" error from Kaspersky antivirus software.

**Solutions proposed/implemented:**

* Update App Installer.
* Configure Kaspersky to allow Pieces OS processes.

**Current status/outcome:**

* Unclear if ThatRendle's issue is resolved.
* Bejokun's issue should be resolved by configuring Kaspersky antivirus.

**Additional notes:**

* The conversation suggests that App Installer issues and antivirus software might be causing PiecesOS launch problems on Windows.
* It's important to ensure that antivirus software is not blocking PiecesOS processes.

related_issues.title: Kaspersky Internet Security flags Pieces OS as a virus
related_issues.text:
Kaspersky Internet Security flags Pieces OS as a virus
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application, Pieces OS

### Operating System / Platform

Windows

### Your Pieces OS Version

PiecesOS_11.2.2.0_x64

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/160ed12d-f0a1-46be-bf36-05502353405e)
## Summary of GitHub Issue Conversation

**Key Points Raised:**

* The user is experiencing problems with their Pieces OS. 
* The problem occurs during the update process.

**Problems Identified:**

* The OS update fails.

**Solutions Proposed/Implemented:**

* The support bot recommends other issues with similar problems and suggests checking the documentation, YouTube channel, and existing issues.

**Current Status/Outcome:**

* The issue has been triaged and routed to the appropriate team member. 
* The user will receive a follow-up within 24 hours.

**Additional Notes:**

* There is no information about the specific details of the update failure.
* It is unclear whether the user has tried any troubleshooting steps or provided relevant information.

recommendations: "This message is empty" error is a recurring issue across platforms and needs immediate attention to address the root cause and prevent further occurrences.
Investigate compatibility issues with Kaspersky Internet Security and potentially other antivirus software to reduce false positive detections and improve the update experience.
Provide clear guidance on personal domain backup and restore functionality, addressing potential conflicts and ensuring data integrity during the process.
Address the issue with the "Secret Message" example in the LTM, ensuring its functionality across different LLM models and providing clear instructions to users.
Investigate the Stack Overflow Chrome Extension issue and ensure compatibility with the website to prevent disruptions and improve user experience.
Monitor App Installer updates and their impact on Pieces OS installation and update processes, providing timely guidance to users in case of known issues.
Consider implementing a system to proactively identify and address common issues based on user reports, potentially through automated solutions or FAQs.
